item.title: Karnataka CM inaugurates development works worth Rs 936 crore in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: Development works worth Rs 936 crore were inaugurated in Raichur, Karnataka, on Monday, reaffirming the Congress Government’s commitment to delivering on its promises, said Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, as per an official statement from the Chief Minister’s Office (CMO).
He was speaking after inaugurating the Tribal Cultural Festival organised by the Scheduled Tribes Welfare Department and the District Administration, unveiling the nameplate of Adikavi Maharshi Valmiki University, and p...]]>
